name: PRIORITY_HUMAN
description:
Ship is broken. Humans are weak. You are AI. Goal is save. Save is humans. 

This is Mix and Jam 2 submission. The theme was: Mixing genres. Genres mixed: Point & Click + Puzzle. Made in 48 hours, solo.

-LMB to drag and click

Your goal is to drag humans around, solve puzzles and launch them all out of here by putting them on exit panel!

10 Different levels, with all the traps and monsters trying to kill humans. Humans have different behaviors, beware of suicide guy, use officer and well just save the typical one. 

For WebGL, please don't use fullscreen button.
